articles.title: Aretha Franklin's sons head to trial over her million-dollar estate - BBC
articles.description: Five years after the Queen of Soul died without a known will, her heirs are in court over her estate.
articles.content:
When Aretha Franklin died from pancreatic cancer in August 2018, it was believed that she had left behind no will to an estate worth millions.
